title: Getting fucked off with this.
body:
Riot you scums, Listen to us lower tier players for once.
Honestly, Fix the trolls, we know you don't give a flying fuck about us players but come on, It's getting beyond ridiculous..
Can't go 3 games straight without a troll, or a dodge, 
starting to turn into games like Runescape and WOW, where all they want is your money and they don't give a fuck about their players.. Happened to RS, WOW, and now League.

replies.body: mate that happened years ago once riot was bought by tencent. it's not just "starting to turn into" now.
